channel.title: onecybit
channel.description: security research, CTF writeups, and tooling

item.title: SOC Lab — Ch.2: Sysmon, Suricata & Wazuh Integration
item.description: Expanding the SOC lab with Sysmon deep-logging on Windows and Suricata IDS on the server. Configuring Wazuh to ingest both host-based and network telemetry.

item.title: SOC Lab — Ch.1: Setup & SIEM Deployment
item.description: Building a home SOC lab with Wazuh SIEM, a Windows 10 endpoint, and Kali Linux as attacker. Covers internal networking, static IPs, and agent registration.

item.title: Nmap: Tips & Techniques for CTF
item.description: Practical Nmap command reference for CTF and pentesting. SYN scanning, firewall evasion, NSE scripting, output formats, and scan delta comparison.
